A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A fresh\, interesting take at the Star Wars Universe with a message full of heart and import for our times. The film makes several important choices with character growth\, plot revelations\, and the nature of the Force that it will be interesting to see if Abrams continues or walks back in the final film. The film has some great \"wow\" visual moments throughout that help capture the essence of the space saga. Unfortunately\, the Finn subplot falls short at certain moments\, and greater visual creativity could reasonably be asked for in regards to some of the new worlds that we encounter. Do not listen to the lazy and somehow contradictory \"fan\" reviews that paint the film as A.) a simple remake of Empire Strikes Back or B.) ruining the Star Wars canon; see it for yourself with an open mind and make your own call!
